name: Vegan Cheese Grits
description: Vegan Cheese Grits are creamy, comforting and a staple in Southern cooking! Perfect for breakfast or dinner. Try serving with BBQ tofu and collard greens for an amazing meal!
recipeIngredient: 1 cup corn grits (*I used Bob's Red Mill)
Optional: 1/2 cup vegan cheddar cheese shreds

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium sized pot, bring vegetable broth, water, garlic powder and nutritional yeast to a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium sized pot, bring vegetable broth, water, garlic powder and nutritional yeast to a boil.

recipeInstructions.text: Add grits slowly and whisk it in to prevent clumps. Cook uncovered over low-medium heat, stirring frequently, for about 20 minutes until thick and creamy.
recipeInstructions.name: Add grits slowly and whisk it in to prevent clumps. Cook uncovered over low-medium heat, stirring frequently, for about 20 minutes until thick and creamy.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from heat and stir in vegan butter and optional cheese until melted. Add salt to taste as desired. Serve and enjoy!
